glide.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
glide.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: couples gliding over the dance floor
glide.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: if a bird glides, it flies without moving its wings
glide.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: if a plane glides, it flies without using an engine
glide.translation[0].definitions[3].defi: to do or achieve things easily
glide.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: Kennedy seemed to glide through life.
glide.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort
glide.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: the act of moving from one musical note to another without a break in sound
glide.translation[1].definitions[2].defi: a vowel which is made by moving your tongue from one position to another
